model

Class Scenario

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Scenario
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Scenario
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Keeps track of lists of criteria, and their characteristics and weighting, to define a scenario. The scenario can be defined by a user, or it can be the ideal scenario for the use of a particular AbstractAlgorithm.

    • Field Summary

      An unique identifier of the scenario which is valid during loading time.

      Name, or role, of the scenario

    • Field Detail

      • criteriaTable

        private final java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,Criterion> criteriaTable
        All criteria are saved in a hashtable with their ID as key. This ID is the String which is used to save the criterion.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Scenario

        public Scenario(Scenario scenario)
        Copy constructor. Beware: The unique ID is also copied! This is because the copied scenario is used to save a state of the original scenario and therewith considered as the same scenario.
        Parameters:
        scenario - to be copied

      • Scenario
